meanings.definition: The act of sounding a horn to call back hounds in hunting.
meanings.sent1: During the hunt, the recheat echoed through the forest, signaling the hounds to return.
meanings.sent2: The hunter's recheat was heard far and wide, guiding the hounds back to safety.
meanings.sent3: The recheat was so loud that even the squirrels paused to listen before continuing their play.
meanings.sent4: The recheat cut through the silence like a sharp blade, bringing the hounds back swiftly.
meanings.sent5: The haunting sound of the recheat lingered in the air, a reminder of the hunt.

meanings.definition: A call or signal to hounds to return.
meanings.sent1: With a single recheat, the hounds knew it was time to head back to their master.
meanings.sent2: The clear recheat carried over the hills, beckoning the hounds to come home.
meanings.sent3: The recheat was so melodious that even the birds paused their chirping to listen.
meanings.sent4: The recheat floated in the air like a gentle whisper, guiding the hounds back safely.
meanings.sent5: The familiar recheat filled the forest, a comforting sound for both hounds and hunters.

meanings.definition: To sound a horn to call back hounds.
meanings.sent1: The hunter would recheat loudly to gather the hounds after a successful chase.
meanings.sent2: He recheated with skill, knowing the hounds would swiftly respond to his call.
meanings.sent3: The hounds always perked up when they heard him recheat, knowing it was time to return.
meanings.sent4: She recheated with such enthusiasm that even the most stubborn hound would come running.
meanings.sent5: The hunter's recheating echoed through the valley, a familiar sound to all who knew him.

meanings.definition: To call back hounds using a horn.
meanings.sent1: The hunter would recheat to gather the hounds after a long day of tracking.
meanings.sent2: Recheating was a skill the hunter had mastered to perfection over the years.
meanings.sent3: The hounds wagged their tails happily as they heard him recheat, knowing it was time to head home.
meanings.sent4: She recheated with such passion that even the laziest hound would come trotting back.
meanings.sent5: The echoing recheat filled the forest, a sound that brought joy to both hounds and hunters alike.
